name: Clash of Egyptian Archers 3d free
description:
Top free ios archer game with real archery simulation and ancient Egyptian civilization battle.
What will be your feeling if you came back in your Empire after a long time and your enemies took kingdom from your ancestors and take your girl from you? So in this critical situation you have no any other chance except to fight with them and take your Empire and girl back from them.
Train yourself as a Master of Archery! Run towards temple and survive the kingdom of Egyptian Empire. Be ready for inevitable clash with skilled archers behind every hurdle. You are equipped with multiple weapons like sword and bow arrows. You can also buy suitable weapons like Arrows, Ax, Sword, Hammer and Mac etc from Virtual Purchasing shop by spend earned Points in game. They also put a Giant Spider inside the pyramid around your girl. Kill it before anything bad happens.
How to Play:
- Swipe anywhere on the screen to set aim.
- Press shoot to shoot archer or as per weapon requirement.
- You can practice and perfect your accuracy by going to mission window.
- Aim proper then shoot.
Features:
- Realistic 3D graphics with dynamic lighting and amazing killing effects.
- User friendly GUI and controls.
- Kill enemies to accomplish mission at the end you will be rewarded by gold coins.
- Gold coins can be used to buy medikits and other weapons from the store menu.
- Real ancient Egyptian environment.
- Support for HD phone devices and tablets.
- Advance Archer simulation game.
- Free offline IOS game.
- Good quality sound effects.
- Efficient weapon controls & movement.
- Free Game Just Install and Enjoy..!
